title: Vehicles Info From Telematics Vendor
description: Returns json with all vehicles from r4m_oa_vehicles table. Deprecated. Endpoint - https://api.route4me.com/api/v1/vehicles_info/all

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Limit of the returned activity feed events number - GET.

x-original-api-key.title: X Original Api key
x-original-api-key.description: Authorization by Route4Me key in the http request header, for Route4Me users - GET.

created_time_from_ts.title: Created Time from_ts
